org.dellroad.linode.apiv4.spring

Class LinodeApiRequestSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dellroad.linode.apiv4.spring.LinodeApiRequestSender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean

    public class LinodeApiRequestSender
extends Object
implements org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
    Sender for Linode REST APIv4 requests.

      • getAllLinodes

        public List<Linode> getAllLinodes(org.springframework.core.task.AsyncTaskExecutor executor,
                                  Filter filter)
                           throws InterruptedException
        Get all Linode instances.

        Pages after the first are loaded asynchronously using the given AsyncTaskExecutor, if any; if executor is null, pages are loaded synchronously and sequentially.

        Parameters:
        executor - executor for loading pages
        filter - filter for returned values, or null for no filter
        Returns:
        all Linodes
        Throws:
        org.springframework.web.client.RestClientException - if an error occurs
        InterruptedException - if the current thread is interrupted while waiting for executor

      • getAllLinodes

        public List<Linode> getAllLinodes(Filter filter)
        Get all Linode instances.

        Pages are loaded synchronously and sequentially.

        Parameters:
        filter - filter for returned values, or null for no filter
        Returns:
        all Linodes
        Throws:
        org.springframework.web.client.RestClientException - if an error occurs

      • getAllLinodeVolumes

        public List<Volume> getAllLinodeVolumes(org.springframework.core.task.AsyncTaskExecutor executor,
                                        Filter filter,
                                        int linodeId)
                                 throws InterruptedException
        Get all volumes attached to a Linode instance.

        Pages after the first are loaded asynchronously using the given AsyncTaskExecutor, if any; if executor is null, pages are loaded synchronously and sequentially.

        Parameters:
        executor - executor for loading pages
        filter - filter for returned values, or null for no filter
        linodeId - Linode ID
        Returns:
        all attached volumes
        Throws:
        org.springframework.web.client.RestClientException - if an error occurs
        InterruptedException - if the current thread is interrupted while waiting for executor

      • getAllDistributions

        public List<Distribution> getAllDistributions(Filter filter)
        Get all Linux distributions.

                    String pathTemplate,
                    Object... templateParameters)
        Query a resource via GET.
        Type Parameters:
        R - response type
        Parameters:
        responseType - response type
        pathTemplate - resource URI path (relative)
        templateParameters - parameter values for parameters in pathTemplate
        Returns:
        response from query
        Throws:
        org.springframework.web.client.RestClientException - if an error occurs
        IllegalArgumentException - if page is less than one
        IllegalArgumentException - if responseType or pathTemplate is null

      • getAll

        protected <T,P extends Paginated<T>> List<T> getAll(Class<P> responseType,
                                                    Filter filter,
                                                    String pathTemplate,
                                                    Object... templateParameters)
        Get all instances of the specified type, by querying for and aggreating however many pages there are.

        Pages are loaded synchronously and sequentially.

        Type Parameters:
        T - item type
        P - paginated response type
        Parameters:
        responseType - paginated response type
        filter - filter for returned values, or null for no filter
        pathTemplate - resource URI path (relative)
        templateParameters - parameter values for parameters in pathTemplate
        Returns:
        combined results from all pages
        Throws:
        org.springframework.web.client.RestClientException - if an error occurs
        IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is null

      • getAll

        protected <T,P extends Paginated<T>> List<T> getAll(Class<P> responseType,
                                                    org.springframework.core.task.AsyncTaskExecutor executor,
                                                    Filter filter,
                                                    String pathTemplate,
                                                    Object... templateParameters)
                                             throws InterruptedException
        Get all instances of the specified type, by querying for and aggreating however many pages there are.

        Pages after the first are loaded asynchronously using the given AsyncTaskExecutor, if any; if executor is null, pages are loaded synchronously and sequentially.

        Type Parameters:
        T - item type
        P - paginated response type
        Parameters:
        responseType - paginated response type
        executor - executor loading pages
        filter - filter for returned values, or null for no filter
        pathTemplate - resource URI path (relative)
        templateParameters - parameter values for parameters in pathTemplate
        Returns:
        combined results from all pages
        Throws:
        org.springframework.web.client.RestClientException - if an error occurs
        IllegalArgumentException - if responseType, pathTemplate, or templateParameters is null
        InterruptedException - if the current thread is interrupted while waiting for executor
